Subject: Very slow progress on the Client Software Upgrade job
Description:
Hi Team,

Regina Maria team reached out to me mentioning that they are currently working to upgrade their clients to version 6.2.4.1006 to fix the interoperability with Bitdefender described within the release notes for 5.9.4.1. (Improved Stealthy DPI Interoperability
with Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools / #319842 / EPPSUPPORT-3713, page 21: https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EndpointProtector_5.9.4_ReleaseNotes/resource/Netwrix_EndpointProtector_5.9.4_BugFixList.pdf).

An upgrade job was created for this purpose under System Configuration > Client Software Upgrade, but very little progress is seen for it. 
Server version is 5.9.4.1.

When replying, please also add following email address: it.security@reginamaria.ro

Please let us know if other details would be needed here.

Thank you,

Oana Nemes | Team Lead, Customer Success
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com  
(+40) 264-593 110 

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
Solution_Comment__c: Closing this ticket as resolved for now and customer will test the client upgrade once again once the next patch will be released.
